name: Kids Top Tamil Stories - Offline & Moral Stories
description: Tamil Kids Stories includes top Tamil kids stories and moral stories videos for kids to learn and enjoy in Tamil for free.  Download once and keep playing the Tamil Moral Kids Stories that are added in App. All Story videos of high quality and supports different devices.  DOWNLOAD ONCE! LEARN/PLAY ANYWHERE, ANY TIME!  Tamil Story Videos are the perfect mix of Adventure and Entertainment with Cute 3D Animated Characters, Stories, Sound and kids Music.   Tamil Kids Stories in this application are:  Ant and The Dove  Belling the Cat  The Bear and The Bees  The City Mouse and The Country Mouse  The Fox and The Stork  The Old Lion And The Clever Fox  SlyFox and The piece of meat  The Wolf and The Lamb   Also we are always working on adding more new interesting Tamil Stories videos to this app.  Features:  High Quality, High Definition Tamil Stories Videos  Cute 3D Animations with Background Music and Sounds  Ads-Free Application with the Premium Pack  3D Fun Animated Videos with Auto play  Easy Access to the Downloaded In-App Videos  Offline Mode to Enjoy the Tamil Moral Stories Videos on the go  There is a Premium Pack option to remove ads from the application to provide the best experiences for your kid. This enables a wholesome experience as the advertisements can be distracting from the fun, entertainment and adventures of Moral Stories.   Please rate our app and leave us a comment to improve your experience with us. Have fun with the stories of Tamil top moral stories!!!  Wed love to hear from you! If you or your kids love Kids Tamil Stories, please leave us a review and share your thoughts! If youd like to report any bugs, suggest features for future updates or just say hi, just email us on apps@videogyan.com!  Why not follow us on social media and join the community?
